snippet: A former Xavier University basketball player who was expelled over what he says was a false rape allegation has settled his lawsuit against the Cincinnati school over its handling of the case....

headline.print_headline: Basketball Star Wells Settles Suit Against Xavier
headline.main: Basketball Star Wells Settles Suit Against Xavier

lead_paragraph: A former Xavier University basketball player who was expelled over what he says was a false rape allegation has settled his lawsuit against the Cincinnati school over its handling of the case.
